bike.description: All new Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted, tapered headtube, forged BB shell w/ integrated ISCG 05 tabs, forged horizontal dropouts w/ integrated chain tensioners. Includes both geared and singlespeed dropouts.

components.description: Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings
Collar, single and multispeed hardware, owner's manual
